column1: Little Goat Diner////I don't think you could get a bad meal here if you tried. Their potatoes are probably the most delicious thing I've ever eaten. They make their own bread
column2: so their English muffin with smoked salmon is absolutely incredible. Seriously
column3: there are so many good things on this menu
column4: I could eat there every day for a few weeks and be completely happy!
